DOC.brief_summary: The aim randomize placebo- control clinical trial evaluate effect Lactobacillus rhamnosus SP1- contain probiotic tablet azithromycin tablet adjunct scale root planning ( SRP ) . Material method : Fifty-four chronic periodontitis patient recruit monitored clinically , immunologically microbiologically baseline , 3 , 6 , 9 12 month therapy . All patient receive scale root planning randomly assign probiotic experimental ( SRP + probiotic , n=18 ) , antibiotic experimental ( SRP + Azithromycin , n=18 ) control ( SRP + placebo , n=18 ) group . Probiotic use per day 3 month . Antibiotic use per day 5 day .
